website_summaries.verdict: These low cost overalls are also comfortable and breathable to keep you from getting too hot while you work.
pros: Does a good job of keeping the dirt and debris off of your clothing
Elastic bands help keep the ankle and wrist areas tight to your skin
Zipper goes into the hood to help protect your neck or lapel
cons: This model does not come with protective feet covering

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke after 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: I liked the weight and the seams but the cheap zipper is its Achilles heel. Would not buy again due to to the very cheap zipper! Was sitting on a tractor spraying an orchard. Sized appropriately with plenty of room in coveralls so no reason for the zipper failure except it is cheap junk! The suit does no good if the zipper fails.
customer_reviews.author: sunyvail

customer_reviews.title: A must for any house or yard work
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hazmat suit ever!!! I ordered this because I was going to clean up my alley way and didn't want any dirt or bugs to get on me so I ordered this. Comfortable to the max. I would order again
customer_reviews.author: Lisa U

customer_reviews.title: I used up 3 of these painting inside and outside ...
customer_reviews.text: I used up 3 of these painting inside and outside our home. The only issue was that liquid paint spots leaked through to my clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This Disposable Cleaning Suit was just what was needed for wearing whilst cleaning out an old detached garage. The Suit is breathable to a degree and easy to get on and off. Highly recommend. Incredible for the Price.
customer_reviews.author: TheMom

customer_reviews.title: Good Shop Addition
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to my shop... only drawn back is this rips relatively easily... not like tyvek. Squat or turn sharply and it will shred... but for auto painting, sand blasting, etc, it would be perfect
customer_reviews.author: dralexy

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Survived an entire weekend of painting a basement ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Brown

customer_reviews.title: Should have a few of these tucked away for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: Bought these a while ago, never know when u might need it
customer_reviews.author: Grace palisay

customer_reviews.title: Great for weed trimming too
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for weed trimming. If you have a hillside that gets a little out of hand, these are perfect to slip on for the chore.
customer_reviews.author: ShopperAR

customer_reviews.title: Great cover-all for painting projects
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for my employees with their painting projects. I'll be purchasing more when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Donna G.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, does what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: Epoxy Paint didn't leach through, Material seems durable to work in too.
customer_reviews.author: erex

customer_reviews.title: worked
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchased. Not yop quality but it is the vest I found for the price .
customer_reviews.author: G. C..

customer_reviews.title: Keeping chemicals and such off of my
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. It kept out all the material I was spraying
customer_reviews.author: MotorHead  69

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: all good. lapel staying closed was tough, but not too shabby,
customer_reviews.author: Bryoonie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it fit the purpose of having to have one on
customer_reviews.author: Lori Martin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our project. Comfy and well covered without getting too warm.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Widrick

customer_reviews.title: Has 2 zipersband is reliable!!! Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it it has 2 zipers and is easy to son and dof!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed, fast shipping, great product, and have used multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: RAYGARD White Disposable Hooded Coveralls SMS Chemical Protective Suits Elastic Cuffs Front Zipper Closure Serged Seams XL for Spray Painting Mechanic Work
feature_bullets: Made of lightweight spunbond-meltblown polypropylene(SMS) material,duarlity for use in hazardous environments for working and includes a multitude of comfort features.

Elastic cuffs, waist,ankles and hood to ensure a better fit and freedom of movement.Serged seams,storm flap to help provide higher standard protection.Front zipper closure to facilitate putting on and removing the suit.
PPE Directive, CE Category III, Type 5/6 protection garment
Breathable material helps reduce heat build-up,against liquids, sprays, powders, fiberglass and sanding dust
Applications:Car Industry, Cement Manufacturing, Costruction Work, Asbetos inspection, Handling Toxic Powderss, Painting and Coating, Gardening, Domestic DIY, Waste Management.
